channel.title: How to add different items to shops

item.title: How to add different items to shops
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Yes I know I shouldn’t have to tell him how to do it, but I don’t want him spamming the forums on how to add different items to his shops.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add different items to shops

item.title: How to add different items to shops
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

koopa king:

Next time please use the tutorial section of the forums. But other than that, go into your shops.cfg file, and find the shop that you want to add items to. Then, make sure you use tabs instead of spaces. The first number you have to add is the Item ID, and then add the quantity of that item in that shop. If you need to make a new shop, please look on how to do it in the tutorial section.

You shouldn’t have had to tell him that.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add different items to shops
